com.jaxws.json.serializer
Interface JSONObjectCustomizer

public interface JSONObjectCustomizer

Version:
2.0 User may customize the serialization and deserialization of JSON process by implementing JSONObjectCustomizer inteface.
Author:
Sundaramurthi Saminathan
